```{r}
library(haven)

library(sf)
library(data.table)

```

```{r}
dat_person_raw <- fread("../../data_raw/large_files/Persona_CPV-2024.csv")
```


```{r}
set.seed(420)

sample <- dat_person_raw %>%
  group_by(matchingID) %>%
  slice_sample(n = 20) %>%
  ungroup()

saveRDS(sample,"../../data_raw/samples/sample001.RDS")
```
